p: Furthermore, calli of P. amarus successfully proliferated in vitro under light conditions using only BA as a phytoregulator (culture medium without 2,4-D). In these treatments, chlorophyll synthesis was observed in calli after the 15th day of cultivation, according to the acquisition of the green color and rigid consistency ( Figure 2A). The best treatment for these conditions aiming at callus proliferation, determined by the fresh weight, was observed in the concentration of 2 mg/L BA (1.92 g/callus) ( Table 3).
